${modID}:DreamingStone.NAME: Dreaming Stone
${modID}:DreamingStone.FLAVOR: Keep it under your pillow, and you might finally remember your dreams.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, use the top #b10 cards of your draw pile as your hand.

${modID}:VoiceBox.NAME: Voice Box
${modID}:VoiceBox.FLAVOR: It records and repeats and records and repeats the sounds around the sounds around it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your cards are played in pairs. The second card will use the first card's damage and #yBlock.

${modID}:OwlCharm.NAME: Owl Charm
${modID}:OwlCharm.FLAVOR: A sigil of those seeking a different form of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yPower card, transform it into a random card and reduce its cost to #b0 for the combat.

${modID}:SockPuppet.NAME: Sock Puppet
${modID}:SockPuppet.FLAVOR: His name is Lord Ultraviolence the Second.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw an #yUnplayable card, gain #b4 #yBlock.

${modID}:Placebo.NAME: Placebo
${modID}:Placebo.FLAVOR: I swear, it really changes things.

${modID}:CounterfeitCoin.NAME: Counterfeit Coin
${modID}:CounterfeitCoin.FLAVOR: Don't get it mixed up with the real thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle a copy of all your #yRare cards into your draw pile.

${modID}:BlessedLeaf.NAME: Blessed Leaf
${modID}:BlessedLeaf.FLAVOR: A leaf of the sacred Lun Tree.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy for each #yAttack in your deck.

${modID}:SendingBell.NAME: Sending Bell
${modID}:SendingBell.FLAVOR: Ring it thrice, in memory of those you have seen away.
DESCRIPTIONS: Combats drop an additional #rCurse card reward. Whenever you obtain a #rCurse, obtain a random relic.
Add a curse to your deck

${modID}:AmuletFragment.NAME: Amulet Fragment
${modID}:AmuletFragment.FLAVOR: This tiny shattered fragment still glows with a faint light.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remove a card from your deck, raise your Max HP by #b5.

${modID}:Scissors.NAME: Scissors
${modID}:Scissors.FLAVOR: What a strange design for a weapon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttack cards deal additional damage equal to the number of other #yAttack cards in your hand.

${modID}:Triangle.NAME: Triangle
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yAttack, #ySkill, and #yPower card you play each combat cost #b0.

${modID}:MiniPagoda.NAME: Miniature Pagoda
${modID}:MiniPagoda.FLAVOR: Nine is the limit; to go higher is defiance.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You cannot draw more than #b9 cards each turn.
